ComicInfo.Summary:
Say Anything singer and songwriter, Max Bemis, delivers a visceral story of Crossed misery that will leave you scarred for life. Every survivor knows that there is nothing but wretchedness awaiting them in a Crossed world. But despite the hate and fear that rule the infected domain, love still finds a way to creep into even the direst of circumstances. Is there hope for more than survival in a world of maniacs?
Available with Regular & Torture Covers by Christian Zanier, Wraparound Cover by Daniel Gete, C-Day Worldwide Cover by German Nobile, Art Deco Cover by Michael Dipascale, and Red Crossed Incentive Cover also by Zanier.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Christian Zanier | 1 | TC | Torture Cver | Michael DiPascale | 2 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Daniel Gete | 3 | AD | Art Deco Cover | Michael DiPascale | 4 | CDW | C-Day Worldwide Cover (India) | German Nobile | 5 | RI | Red Crossed Order Incentive Cover | Christian Zanier | 6 |
